step_one.it_is_not_something_you_want_to_see: It is not something you want to see

step_four.is_there_anything_else_we_should_know: Is there anything else we should know?

step_final.when_you_see_something_you_dont_like_on_: When you see something you don’t like on Mastodon, you can remove the person from your experience.
step_final.you_wont_see_their_posts_or_reblogs_in_y: You won’t see their posts or reblogs in your home feed. They won’t know they’ve been muted.
step_final.they_will_no_longer_be_able_to_follow_or: They will no longer be able to follow or see your posts, but they can see if they’ve been blocked.
step_final.while_we_review_this_you_can_take_action: While we review this, you can take action against %s
